jobDescription: Over 800 million people use Instagram, which means jobs here offer countless ways to make an impact in a fast growing organization. Instagram was built to strengthen relationships through shared experiences. Our app has played a critical part in forming meaningful communities where people can connect with each other and share what matters most to them.Mobile cameras have become a creative canvas through which we share our life in unique and creative ways. We are seeking full-time Android Engineers to join the Camera team. In this role, you will specialize in building performant camera and AR features, as well as creative tools that power the most popular camera products in the world. You will get an opportunity to bring world-class technologies to hundreds of millions of people. Responsibilities:
